title: 14th May 1796: English physician and scientist Edward Jenner tests the process of vaccination against smallpox using cowpox infection
itunes:summary: Jenner scientifically tested, and proved, that infection with the mild disease of cowpox gave immunity to the more dangerous smallpox ...
